title: Andrew Yang Interview and more
itunes:title: Andrew Yang Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had Andrew Yang call in where he breaks down Senate majority race, political messaging and his future In government. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Florida Governor who drafts laws that would allow people to shoot looters and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Andrew Yang call in where he breaks down Senate majority race, political messaging and his future In government. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Florida Governor who drafts laws that would allow people to shoot looters and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
